verses.roman:
e vṛkṣera aṅga haya saba sa-cetana
bāḍiyā vyāpila sabe sakala bhuvana

synonyms: e—this; vṛkṣera—of the Caitanya tree; aṅga—parts; haya—are; saba—all; sa-cetana—spiritually cognizant; bāḍiyā—increasing; vyāpila—overflooded; sabe—all the parts; sakala—all; bhuvana—the world.
translation: "All the parts of this tree are spiritually cognizant, and thus as they grow up they spread all over the world.
